scripts.build: yarn run build-less && yarn run build-elm
scripts.build-debug: yarn run build-less && yarn run build-elm-debug
scripts.build-elm: cd web/elm && elm make --output ../public/elm.js --optimize src/Main.elm && uglifyjs < ../public/elm.js > ../public/elm.min.js
scripts.build-elm-debug: cd web/elm && elm make --debug --output ../public/elm.js src/Main.elm && uglifyjs < ../public/elm.js > ../public/elm.min.js
